languages.text: {n}Неожиданно выражение лица Ардженты меняется — ее взгляд устремлен на Ирлиэт.{/n} "Вольный Торговец... что эта тварь делает подле вас? Почему предательница-ксенос еще не получила возмездие за свою подлость?! Я помню, что говорил ее проклятый соплеменник, когда мы попали в ловушку — помнишь ли ты, {name}, как она предала нас?"

{n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"
languages.original_text: {n}Неожиданно выражение лица Ардженты меняется — ее взгляд устремлен на Ирлиэт.{/n} "Вольный Торговец... что эта тварь делает подле вас? Почему предательница-ксенос еще не получила возмездие за свою подлость?! Я помню, что говорил ее проклятый соплеменник, когда мы попали в ловушку — помнишь ли ты, {name}, как она предала нас?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that fiend standing beside you? Why hasn't the traitorous xenos yet found retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kinsman said when we stepped into that trap — do you, {name}? Have you forgotten what she did?"

{n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that fiend standing beside you? Why hasn't the traitorous xenos yet found retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kinsman said when we stepped into that trap — do you, {name}? Have you forgotten what she did?"

{n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that fiend standing beside you? Why hasn't the treacherous xenos yet found retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kinsman said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten what she did?"

{n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that fiend standing beside you? Why hasn't the treacherous xenos yet found retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kinsman said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten what she did?"

{n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

{n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

languages.text: {n}ユリエットを目にし、アルジェンタの表情が一変する。{/n}「自由開拓者よ…なぜその生物があなたのそばにいる？なぜ裏切り者の異種族は、策略に対する報復を受けていないのだ？我々が罠に足を踏み入れたとき、彼女の呪われたキンが何と言ったか覚えている。あなたはどうだ、{name}？彼女の裏切りを忘れたのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットを目にし、アルジェンタの表情が一変する。{/n}「自由開拓者よ…なぜその生物があなたのそばにいる？なぜ裏切り者の異種族は、策略に対する報復を受けていないのだ？我々が罠に足を踏み入れたとき、彼女の呪われたキンが何と言ったか覚えている。あなたはどうだ、{name}？彼女の裏切りを忘れたのか？」

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔看到伊莉耶特时，脸色大变。{/n}“行商浪人……那头孽畜为什么还站在你身边？那个奸诈的异形，为什么还没有因为她的奸计得到报应？当我们踏入那个陷阱时，我还记得她那个该死的亲戚说了些什么。莫非你已经忘记了她的背叛吗，{name}？”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔看到伊莉耶特时，脸色大变。{/n}“行商浪人……那个恶魔为什么还站在你身边？那个奸诈的异形，为什么还没有因为她的奸计得到报应？当我们踏入那个陷阱时，我还记得她那个该死的亲戚说了些什么。莫非你忘了吗，{name}？你已经忘了她的所作所为了吗？”

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Argenta cambia drásticamente cuando ve a Yrliet.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente... ¿qué hace esa criatura a su lado? ¿Por qué no ha sufrido aún la xenos traicionera por sus artimañas? Recuerdo lo que dijo su primo maldito cuando caímos en esa trampa. ¿Y usted, {name}? ¿Ha olvidado que nos traicionó?».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Argenta cambia drásticamente cuando ve a Yrliet.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente... ¿qué hace ese monstruo a su lado? ¿Por qué no ha castigado aún a la xenos traicionera por sus artimañas? Recuerdo lo que dijo su primo maldito cuando caímos en esa trampa. ¿Y usted, {name}? ¿Ha olvidado lo que hizo?».

languages.text: {n}Argentas Ausdruck ändert sich drastisch, als sie Yrliet sieht.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... warum steht diese Kreatur neben Euch? Warum hat die heimtückische Xenos noch keine Vergeltung für ihren Betrug erlitten? Ich weiß noch, was Ihr verfluchter Vetter sagte, als wir in diese Falle getappt sind. Ihr auch, {name}? Habt Ihr vergessen, dass sie uns verraten hat?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Ausdruck ändert sich drastisch, als sie Yrliet sieht.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... warum steht diese Schurkin neben Euch? Warum hat die heimtückische Xenos noch keine Vergeltung für ihren Betrug zu spüren bekommen? Ich weiß noch, was Ihr verfluchter Verwandter gesagt hat, als wir in diese Falle getappt sind. Ihr auch, {name}? Habt Ihr vergessen, was sie getan hat?"

languages.text: {n}L'expression d'Argenta s'assombrit d'un coup lorsque ses yeux se posent sur Yrliet.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}... Que fait cette créature à vos côtés ? Pourquoi cette maudite xénos n'a-t-elle pas encore été châtiée pour sa traîtrise ? Je me souviens parfaitement de ce que son maudit cousin a dit lorsque nous sommes tombés dans ce piège. Pas vous, {name} ? Auriez-vous oublié qu'elle nous a trahis ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression d'Argenta s'assombrit d'un coup lorsque ses yeux se posent sur Yrliet.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}... Que fait ce monstre à vos côtés ? Pourquoi cette maudite xénos n'a pas encore été châtiée pour sa traîtrise ? Je me souviens parfaitement de ce que son congénère a dit lorsque nous sommes tombés dans ce piège. Pas vous, {name} ? Auriez-vous oublié ce qu'elle a fait ? »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'i görünce Argenta'nın yüz ifadesi bir anda değişiyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir... O yaratık neden yanında? Hain, üçkâğıtçı zenoyu neden cezalandırmadın? O tuzağa düştüğümüzde şeref yoksunu soydaşlarının dediklerini iyi hatırlıyorum. Sen hatırlıyor musun {name}? Bize ihanet ettiğini unuttun mu yoksa?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression changes drastically when she sees Yrliet.{/n} "Rogue Trader... why is that creature standing beside you? Why has the treacherous xenos not yet suffered retribution for her trickery? I remember what her accursed kin said when we stepped into that trap. Do you, {name}? Have you forgotten that she betrayed us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'i görünce Argenta'nın yüz ifadesi bir anda çark ediyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir... O yaratık neden yanında duruyor? Hain zenonun üçkâğıtçılığını neden cezalandırmadın? O tuzağa düştüğümüzde şu zenonun şeref yoksunu soydaşlarının dediklerini ben hatırlıyorum. Sen hatırlıyor musun {name}? Bize ihanet ettiğini unuttun mu yoksa?"
